author: catwith1hat
content: In the context of BAL and the code for it already existing: Has anyone considered to change `engine_newPayload` to include a parameter `?make_bal=true` ? The EL would respond with a BAL that includes pre_block_exec_values for all touched slots, which I could then hand to another EL for stateless re-execution. I would love that for cheap fork detection. (None of that would end up in a block. This is just an API change.)
